content: something funny happened when i was crocheting it when i showed my husband the design he said it looked more like a bat i said it s supposed to be a butterfly style shawl then my daughter said it s a bat-terfly shawl so this shawl got it s name before it got very big as you can see it does look like a bat or moth but moth-erfly didn t sound as good lol i decided to add a stylish flap to this one it has 4 functions you can bunch it up to be a scarf leave it on your shoulder for extra warmth plus style or can be pulled up to create a makeshift hood for this project you will need hook 4 mm hook or size g hook for the us yarn i used a yarn cake from yarnart cake content 55% organic cotton 45% anti pilling acrylic ball weight 250 g 8 8 oz yarn weight 1 fingering yarn length 1000 m 1093 yd yarn i used a yarn cake from yarnart flowers yarn color 263 you can find this pattern without pictures for free on my web site @ https //www meladorascreations com/ and the video tutorials on my youtube channel @ https //www youtube com/user/meladora1 if you share pictures on social media please tag it as #batterflyshawl #meladorascreations so i will see it or #candylisfhes on facebook thank you can t wait to see your creations
